author: Ben Jacobs
title: Where the Risk of Coronavirus Comes With Unparalleled Access
description: These days, the White House is almost certainly is the weirdest beat in American journalism.
content: The White House briefing room is a low-ceilinged claustrophobic space. Built on top of a swimming pool where Franklin Delano Roosevelt exercised and John F. Kennedy canoodled, the room has 49 chairs set into the floor where reporters once packed in for daily … [+10861 chars]
